text: 2:9 Matyu 24:24; Jon 8:41; Efesus 2:2; Akar Mogomem 13:11-13; 18:23; 19:20Godɨn Araziba adoghodozir gumazir kam, a Satanɨn gavgavimɨn azenan otogham. Egh Satanɨn ifavarir arazimɨn, a dɨgavir kuram gamir arazir avɨriba ko arazarazir igharaziba ko mirakelɨn ifavarir igharagha gariba, dar amuam.
